skill.name: supabase
skill.description: Manage Supabase projects, databases, migrations, Edge Functions, and storage using the `supabase` CLI.
skill.summary: Manage Supabase projects, databases, migrations, Edge Functions, and storage using the `supabase` CL...
skill.author: Dicklesworthstone

security_audit.summary: This is a pure documentation skill containing only markdown documentation for the Supabase CLI. No executable code, scripts, network calls, or file system access capabilities exist in this skill. It is safe for publication.

content.value_statement: This skill provides documented commands for the Supabase CLI. You can manage Supabase projects, databases, migrations, Edge Functions, and storage directly from your AI assistant without switching context.
actual_capabilities: Start and stop local Supabase development stack
Execute SQL queries and manage database migrations
Manage storage buckets and file operations
Generate TypeScript types from database schema
limitations: Requires Supabase CLI to be installed on your system
Requires authentication with Supabase account for remote operations
Local development requires Docker to run Supabase services
Does not provide direct database connections - uses CLI only

use_cases.title: Manage database schema
use_cases.description: Create and apply migrations, sync local and remote schemas, and generate TypeScript types automatically

use_cases.title: Develop Edge Functions
use_cases.description: Create, deploy, and monitor serverless Edge Functions with local testing support

use_cases.title: Control local environments
use_cases.description: Start, stop, and reset local Supabase stacks for consistent development environments

prompt_templates.title: Start local stack
prompt_templates.prompt: Start a local Supabase development environment with supabase start

prompt_templates.title: List projects
prompt_templates.prompt: List all my Supabase projects using supabase projects list

prompt_templates.title: Create migration
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a new migration called add_user_profile_table using supabase migration new

prompt_templates.title: Deploy Edge Function
prompt_templates.prompt: Deploy my Edge Function called process_data to production using supabase functions deploy

output_examples.input: Start local Supabase and list migrations
output: Starting local Supabase stack (Postgres, Auth, Storage, Realtime)

best_practices: Always run migrations locally before pushing to production
Use type generation to keep TypeScript interfaces in sync with database schema
Link to remote projects before pushing migrations to avoid conflicts
anti_patterns: Pushing migrations directly to production without testing locally
Skipping migration squashing on large projects with many small migrations
Deploying Edge Functions without checking local logs first

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. All provide access to terminal commands.

faq.question: What are the rate limits?
faq.answer: Rate limits depend on your Supabase plan. CLI commands have no limits but API calls to Supabase services do.

faq.question: How do I integrate with CI/CD?
faq.answer: Use supabase db push for migrations and supabase functions deploy for Edge Functions in your pipeline.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill only passes commands to your locally installed Supabase CLI. No data leaves your machine.

faq.question: Commands fail with no output
faq.answer: Ensure Supabase CLI is installed (npm install -g @supabase/cli) and Docker is running for local development.

faq.question: How does this compare to direct SQL clients?
faq.answer: Supabase CLI wraps complex operations like migrations and type generation. Use psql for direct queries.
